title: "Gratis", and new Genesis checksum text
body: Making the distinction between free as in free software, and what is not, one could also go with "freeware" but it has fallen out of fashion i think.

title: Spelling: July
body: Presumably this is not meant to be "June"

title: Select SD Card for Android 5.0 and up
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Should support select external SD Card for android 5.0 and up

title: Support simple expand ROM
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Allow the user to expand or trim the ROM by entering the required size.

title: UniPatcher deletes directory
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body: If the output file name is empty (after renaming), the program deletes the parent directory.

title: Support extender script "ROM Expander Pro.txt"
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Description of the file format can be read from this [link](https://github.com/btimofeev/UniPatcher/wiki/ROM-Expander-Pro)
